title: VAR-PZ: Constraining the Photometric Redshifts of Quasars using Variability
summary: This paper focuses on constraining the photometric redshifts of quasars using variability, leveraging the Vera C. Rubin Observatory LSST survey data. It addresses the challenge of spectroscopic follow-up for the vast number of AGNs discovered by the survey, relying on photometric redshift estimates.
